changeSet.author: irk333
changeSet.sql: alter table payment add account_id integer null; alter table payment add CONSTRAINT fk_payment_account FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES account (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT;

changeSet.author: irk333
changeSet.sql: alter table payment add accounttype_id integer null; alter table payment add CONSTRAINT fk_payment_account_type FOREIGN KEY (accounttype_id) REFERENCES reference (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT;
